title: Charlie Dead and the Seeds of Zombie Chaos
description: In a world at war with zombies, it’s not always easy to tell who the real monsters are. Who can Charlie trust? He finds friends at school, including the unliving Emma and transfer-student Sam. But Charlie can’t share his secrets with anyone, especially his newspaper reporter sister, Bess. And is the zombified secret agent, Wendell Reed, on his side or not? No matter. With infection taking hold, Charlie has no choice but to join Wendell on another adventure. Plunging into a sprawling, swamp-infested wilderness, the unlikely allies search for the source of the zombie virus. But they’re not the only ones on the hunt. Will Charlie get out alive? Even if he does, he might get more than he bargained for. “CHARLIE DEAD and the Seeds of Zombie Chaos” is the second novel in the CHARLIE DEAD series.
author: Geoff Camphire
